entry.title: First Post with Octopress
entry.content:
Octopress is very nice. I like it.

Here are some beatifull code snippets.

ruby Ruby puts "Hello World"

python Python print "Hello World"

``` c++ C++

include

int main() { std::cout << "Hello World" << std::endl; return 0; } ```

``` java Java public class HelloWorld { public static void main(String[] args) {

System.out.println("Hello World");

} } ```

php PHP <?php echo "Hello World" ?>

html Html <html> <body> Hello World </body> </html>
